Class Grass

java.lang.Object
  Grass

public class Grass
extends java.lang.Object

Defines the Static green rectangle of grass that my city has instead of roads, possibly because it is inhabited by hippies

Version:
0.2
Author:
Alex Eastman

Constructor Summary
Grass(java.awt.Color color)
          If one wanted the grass to change color the color parameter makes it easier to customize
 
Method Summary
 void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
          This method draws a green rectangle that fills a static portion of the bottom of the screen, this constant for height (540) is also used as the base point of my buildings as this is earth and our buildings dont float.
